original_text: After them, seven more cows came up out of the river. They were thin and they were not good to look at. I have never seen cows as bad as these in Egypt before.
korean_text: 그 뒤에 또 약하고 심히 흉하고 파리한 일곱 암소가 올라오니 그같이 흉한 것들은 애굽 땅에서 내가 아직 보지 못한 것이라

sentences.original_text: After them, seven more cows came up
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 일곱 마리의 다른 소들이 올라왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and they were not good to look at
I have never seen cows as bad as these
sentences.korean_translation: 이렇게 나쁜 소는 본 적이 없습니다
